connor mcgreggor is my favorite fighter.

content.text: It's going well! I just quit my job and I am feeling really good about it.
That's awesome! Congratulations on taking that step. What are you planning to do next?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going back to school or starting my own business.
Those are both great options. I'm sure you'll figure out what's best for you.
I love to play video games and watch movies. I also love to tell jokes.
Nice! I love to play video games too. What are your favorite games?
I like playing all kinds of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
RPGs are great! I love the story telling and character development.
Have you played any good RPGs recently?
I just finished playing The Witcher 3 and it was amazing!
I heard that game was really good. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's definitely worth it.
I'll put it on my list.
